Your electricity consumption was very high today; here are some ways you can reduce it and save energy and money:
1. Upgrade Appliances: Choose energy-efficient models. 2. Turn Off Lights: Develop the habit of switching off lights and electronics. 3. Unplug Chargers: Disconnect chargers and unused devices to prevent standby energy usage. 4. Set Thermostat Wisely: Adjust to an energy-efficient temperature.
